an5.173:4.1: “Mendicants, a lay follower with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.173:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an5.173:4.4: A lay follower with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.173:5.1: A lay follower with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.173:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an5.173:5.4: A lay follower with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
